revised_title: Titanium Alloys for Engineering Structures: Rosenhain Centenary Conference
tldr: The article discusses the development and properties of titanium alloys for engineering structures, focusing on their high strength-to-density ratio, elevated temperature properties, and corrosion resistance. The author outlines the principles of heat treatment, alloy development, and the factors affecting the cost of titanium alloys. The article also highlights various applications of titanium alloys in aerospace and general engineering.
